comment.author: 88622042@N08
comment._content: pyrmont kid......we were taken to the DOM. Baths, in the 50's,      we all knew our areas....Pyrmont didn't mix with the kids from the " Loo. All relations kept together.Pyrmont used the far right hand corner, near the diving blocks.....Healys, Robinsons and Plummers.  We went in by walking down long winding staircase......after we walked back through the Domain over the Pyrmont Bridge and home. Never went to the new "Boy" Baths.....thx for the pics
